channel.title: MTP - Changing the view on Servers
channel.description:
If you don't like customs, you will NOT like this server.
I'm starting a new project under my same name i've been using for some time - MTP. The base for this server will either be Delta or PI. Which ever base I feel is the best and I find the first I will use.
I'm hoping this server will be very original and there will be very few things that are not customly done and may have not been seen before. I really am tired of seeing all the Runescape remakes. [b]Runescape private servers are supposed to be different and creative.[/b]
[b]Things I hope to get done by this weekend: [/b] -Remove all weapons and armor that exist on current Runescape and replace them with new custom armor pieces with bonuses. -Finish atleast the home area and shop area maps -Add atleast one Custom npc
[b]Things I hope to get done overtime:[/b] -Multiple worlds. Although this server probably won't have many players on for a long time, I want there to be a setup with atleast 2 worlds. -Create custom animations for some of the custom items. -Grand Exchange -Custom Minigames
Progress: Very little has been done considering I started this moments ago. I've just been working on items and maps.
If you have any ideas at all that could go along with being very creative, please feel free to post.
Positions Open: -[b]Modelers[/b] (I'm in deep need of someone who can make items and npcs) -[b]Server side coders[/b] (I don't need tremendous help but if someone wants to make a minigame or something, I wouldn't turn them down. I also need help setting up the multiple worlds because the way i'm going to do it will be buggy.) -[b]Someone good with graphics[/b]
I will make an application to fill out once I deciede on the base. If I can figure out how to convert inits then I will use PI.

item.title: MTP - Changing the view on Servers
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

If you don’t like customs, you will NOT like this server.

I’m starting a new project under my same name i’ve been using for some time - MTP. The base for this server will either be Delta or PI. Which ever base I feel is the best and I find the first I will use.

I’m hoping this server will be very original and there will be very few things that are not customly done and may have not been seen before. I really am tired of seeing all the Runescape remakes. Runescape private servers are supposed to be different and creative.

Things I hope to get done by this weekend:
-Remove all weapons and armor that exist on current Runescape and replace them with new custom armor pieces with bonuses.
-Finish atleast the home area and shop area maps
-Add atleast one Custom npc

Things I hope to get done overtime:
-Multiple worlds. Although this server probably won’t have many players on for a long time, I want there to be a setup with atleast 2 worlds.
-Create custom animations for some of the custom items.
-Grand Exchange
-Custom Minigames

Progress: Very little has been done considering I started this moments ago. I’ve just been working on items and maps.

If you have any ideas at all that could go along with being very creative, please feel free to post.

Positions Open:
-Modelers (I’m in deep need of someone who can make items and npcs)
-Server side coders (I don’t need tremendous help but if someone wants to make a minigame or something, I wouldn’t turn them down. I also need help setting up the multiple worlds because the way i’m going to do it will be buggy.)
-Someone good with graphics

I will make an application to fill out once I deciede on the base. If I can figure out how to convert inits then I will use PI.
